Song.title: The Glory Of The Cross
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Bob Kauflin © 2000 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [A2 C#m7 | A2 Bsus | A2 C#m7 | A2 B |]
Verse 1: What [A2]wisdom once de[C#m7]vised the plan{,} where [A2]all our sin and [Bsus]pride Was [A2]placed upon the [C#m7]perfect Lamb, who [A]suffered, [B]bled, and [E]died The [F#m7sus]wisdom of a [E/G#]sovereign God, whose [A2]greatness will be [Bsus]shown When [A2]those who cruci[C#m7]fied Your Son, re[A]joice a[B]round Your [E]throne
Chorus: And [Bsus]oh, the [C#m7]glory of the [E]cross That [Bsus]You would [F#m7sus]send Your Son for [A2]us I [Bsus]gladly [C#m7]count my life as [E]loss That I might come to [A2]know The [F#m7sus]glory of, the [A2]glory of the [A2 C#m7 | A2 Bsus |]cross.
Verse 2: What [A2]righteousness was [C#m7]there revealed{,} that [A2]sets the guilty [Bsus]free That [A2]justifies un[C#m7]godly men, and [A]calls the [B]filthy [E]clean? A [F#m7sus]righteousness that [E/G#]proved to all, Your [A2]justice has been [Bsus]met And [A2]holy wrath is [C#m7]satisfied, through [A]one at[B]oning [E]death.
Verse 3: What [A2]mercy now has [C#m7]been proclaimed For [A2]those who would be[Bsus]lieve? A [A2]love incompre[C#m7]hensible, our [A]minds could [B]not con[E]ceive A [F#m7sus]mercy that for[E/G#]gives my sin, then [A2]makes me like Your [Bsus]Son And [A2]now I’m loved for[C#m7]evermore, be[A]cause of [B]what You’ve [E]done.
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 what wisdom once devised the plan where all our sin and pride was placed upon the perfect lamb who suffered bled and died the wisdom of a sovereign god whose greatness will be shown when those who crucified your son rejoice around your throne chorus and oh the glory of the cross that you would send your son for us i gladly count my life as loss that i might come to know the glory of the glory of the cross verse 2 what righteousness was there revealed that sets the guilty free that justifies ungodly men and calls the filthy clean a righteousness that proved to all your justice has been met and holy wrath is satisfied through one atoning death verse 3 what mercy now has been proclaimed for those who would believe a love incomprehensible our minds could not conceive a mercy that forgives my sin then makes me like your son and now im loved forevermore because of what youve done
